npcs.name: Armorsmith
npcs.notFullfilingRequirements: You need to be level 5 to talk to this NPC

choices.line: Hello, I sell shoes. Do you want to buy some?
I sell these shoes. Which do you want?
Hello, I sell some stuff, but you don't deserve it. Go away!
Hello, I sell some stuff, but you look poor. Go away!
Help! Hey, over here! I need immediate help!
Thank you, I thought I was done for. I can't thank you enough! I can at least give you this spare part, it might be useful to you.
Thank you! I hope that spare part I gave you will be useful.
*BEEP *BOOP* *BEEP* (Greetings B33-P, you don't happen to have a translator on you? I feel so alone because no one can understand me.)
BEEP* *BOOP* *BOOP* (Awesome! Could you please help me solder it?)

I can finally express myself in human language! Here, take this spare part that was supposed to be my translator. You know, you remind me of my former owner, the mayor. He's a really kind guy. I haven't seen him in a while actually. You should go visit him, he lives just upstairs.
*BEOP* *POOB* *BOEB* *POOE* (Why doing that you? Now speak I can't normal even! Away get!)
*BOOP* *BEEP* *BEEP* *BOOP* (Oh okay, well if you stumble upon one, please bring it to me)
*BEOP* *POOB* *BOEB* *POOE* (Why doing that you? Now speak I can't normal even! Away get!)

I can finally express myself in human language! Here, take this spare part that was supposed to be my translator. You know, you remind me of my former owner, the mayor. He's a really kind guy. I haven't seen him in a while actually. You should go visit him, he lives just upstairs.
Thank you again for cheering me up.
Thank you! There's light in my life again thanks to you. What would I do without music? Take this spare part in return.
Play music to Tinky (-1 Battery cell)
You're gonna play some music for me? I guess that could cheer me up.
Thank you! That really cheered me up! What would I do without music? Take this spare part in return.
You failed to play music to Tinky.
As expected, no one can help me! What's the meaning of life without music? Leave me alone, you're just making it worse!
As expected, no one can help me! What's the meaning of life without music? Leave me alone, you're just making it worse!
I lost my harmonica. I can't find it anywhere! Have you seen it by any chance?
Thank you! There's light in my life again thanks to you. What would I do without music? Take this spare part in return.
Play music to Tinky (-1 Battery cell)
You're gonna play some music for me? I guess that could cheer me up.
Thank you! That really cheered me up! What would I do without music? Take this spare part in return.
You failed to play music to Tinky.
As expected, no one can help me! What's the meaning of life without music? Leave me alone, you're just making it worse!
As expected, no one can help me! What's the meaning of life without music? Leave me alone, you're just making it worse!
Hey, don't steal that from me!
Thank you so much for helping me, metal guy! Guess what- I've got a couple of things in my house, take whatever you need, I won't be needing it anymore.
I hope you enjoyed destroying that tent. Get away from me!

My house! It stood here as long as I can remember, and now it's gone! What am I going to do now? I've become homeless overnight! And as if that wasn't enough, it's so cold outside this time of the year.
Thank you so much for helping me, metal guy! Guess what- I've got a couple of things in my house, take whatever you need, I won't be needing it anymore.
That's really mean of you! I could have used that! Get away from me!

Take whatever you like, little bot, it's not like I own it here. I simply use it to spend the nights, when the acid rain starts to pour. It can be quite dangerous to go outside in the dark these days. Although I don't think it would be a problem for you, with the metal body you have.
Why is it so cold, you ask? You see, my electricity generator got broken. I'd really appreciate your help. I think our engineer in the workshop might be able to fix it.
It's really cold in here! I expected Oliver to show up and help me but he never did. I've been shivering for the last 3 days.
I don't feel like talking to you right now.
I don't feel like talking to you right now.
Oliver stopped by and fixed my generator. Thank you so much! Here, take this as your reward.
Heya, didn't see you there little guy, how are you doing? Wait a second, I think you've got some sparks here and there, do you want me to take a look?

You see, there's this pet project I have, I call it AtmoSphere - it's almost done, I just need six spare parts and a strong enough battery to power it up. When finished, it could protect the whole city from acid rains.
Okay, just let me know if you change your mind.

Oh wow, you got all 6 spare parts. You see, the problem is that I need a strong enough battery to power it up. A battery…like yours. Yes, your battery would be perfect. But…that would shut you down. Are you willing to make such a sacrifice for our city?

You see, there's this pet project I have, I call it AtmoSphere - it's almost done, I just need six spare parts and a strong enough battery to power it up. When finished, it could protect the whole city from acid rains.
So, you've changed your mind then! Come here, let me take a look at it…

You see, there's this pet project I have, I call it AtmoSphere - it's almost done, I just need six spare parts and a strong enough battery to power it up. When finished, it could protect the whole city from acid rains.
Abbz has some electricity problems? I'll make sure to stop by and help her. Make sure to visit her again too, she can get a little lonely sometimes.
You don't have any more battery cells

npcs.name: Are you sure you wish to destroy Oliver's invention?

choices.line: Hey, what do you think you're doing?! It took me a lot of time to create that!
I shall not go there. Could be dangerous.

npcs.name: Are you sure you want to pick up this item?
You don't have enough battery cells to pick up this item.
Cat
npcs.notFullfilingRequirements: You must have a can of cat food in your inventory to feed the cat.

npcs.name: Flower
npcs.notFullfilingRequirements: You don't have any battery cells to waste on watering a flower.

choices.line: Thank you for wasting a battery cell on me.

npcs.name: Do you want to use all spare parts to build a boat?
npcs.notFullfilingRequirements: You don't have enough material to build a boat.
You probably shouldn't touch this piano, it belongs to the upper echelons of society.

choices.line: You tried to play the piano, but you failed miserably.
